actions.title: Generate Arlington HTML Report
actions.name: arlington_html_validation_report
actions.desc: Automatically check grammar in PDF using the Arlington PDF Model. The verification output is a report containing all of the grammatical errors contained in your PDF.
actions.program: docker run --platform linux/amd64 -v "${working_directory}:/data" --rm pdfix/validate-pdf-arlington:latest validate --format html --input "/data/${input_pdf}" --output "/data/${output_html}"

args.name: max_failures
args.desc: Limit of checked fails. If fails reached limit, validation stops.

args.name: max_failures_displayed
args.desc: Maximum fails to displayed. If -1, displayed all.

args.name: input_pdf
args.desc: Path to PDF document you want to proccess
